name: Aporia (itch) (N-Jima)
description:
A short visual story created for the KiwiJam 2022 game jam.

The game tells the story of a long forgotten town, and their battle with a tyrannical god.

The game uses mouse controls. Simply click to advance the text.

Made using the Godot game engine.

Story - Joshua Hsieh

Art - LaurieAstro

Programming - N-jima
